page.title: 16Working on the Project
page.content: At Queen Elizabeth's School work for the Project was done by the{First Year (aged 11-12) and was organised by several departments. The{Classical and Religious Studies department briefed the pupils on the Domesday Book and the nature of the Project. The collection of data was shared by the{Maths and Geography Departments. Material for the text pages was provided by the{English Department. Some work was also done in{Art, concentrating on landscape and townscape. Queen Elizabeth's and the two Primary schools in Crediton produced an eight page{newspaper,}containing an explanation of the Project and samples of pupils' work. This was entitled 'Domesday 1986'. About 800 copies were sold at 20p each.
